StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetOSSMonthlyAc.vityRpt]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgID int, @Year int, @Month int )
AS BEGIN
DECLARE @DataTable TABLE ( ac.vity varchar(5), contacts int default 0, appoints int default 0, interviews int default 0, nwas int default 0 )
INSERT INTO @DataTable(ac.vity) values('TC') INSERT INTO @DataTable(ac.vity) values('DC') INSERT INTO @DataTable(ac.vity) values('AC') INSERT INTO @DataTable(ac.vity) values('OT') INSERT INTO @DataTable(ac.vity) values('Total')
update @DataTable set contacts = src.cnt from @DataTable dt inner join (select count(1) cnt , p.Ac.vity from Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p inner join MCRISS.DBO.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION ro on ro.rowguid = p.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId and ro.Organiza.on_Id = @OrgID and p.Ac.vity in ('TC', 'DC', 'AC', 'OT') and year(Ac.vityDate) = @Year and month(Ac.vityDate) = @Month group by p.Ac.vity) src on dt.ac.vity = src.ac.vity
update @DataTable set appoints = src.cnt from @DataTable dt inner join (select count(1) cnt , p.Ac.vity from Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p inner join MCRISS.DBO.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION ro on ro.rowguid = p.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId and ro.Organiza.on_Id = @OrgID and p.Ac.vity in ('TC', 'DC', 'AC', 'OT') inner join RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject es on es.SubjectId = p.ProspectId inner join RSSOSS.USMC.Event e on es.EventId = e.Id and e.eventypeid = 1 and year(e.StartDate) = @Year and month(e.StartDate) = @Month group by p.Ac.vity) src on dt.ac.vity = src.ac.vity
update @DataTable set interviews = src.cnt from @DataTable dt inner join (select count(1) cnt , p.Ac.vity from Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect p inner join MCRISS.DBO.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION ro on ro.rowguid = p.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId and ro.Organiza.on_Id = @OrgID and p.Ac.vity in ('TC', 'DC', 'AC', 'OT') inner join RSSOSS.USMC.EventSubject es on es.SubjectId = p.ProspectId inner join RSSOSS.USMC.Event e on es.EventId = e.Id and e.eventypeid = 1 inner join USMC.EventOutcome eo on eo.EventId = e.ID and AppointmentOutcomeId = 1 and year(e.StartDate) = @Year and month(e.StartDate) = @Month group by p.Ac.vity) src on dt.ac.vity = src.ac.vity
update @DataTable set nwas = src.cnt from @DataTable dt inner join (select count(1) cnt , Ac.vity_Code Ac.vity from Mcriss.dbo.nwa where organiza.on_of_record_id = @OrgID and year(NWA_DECLARED_DATE) = @Year and month(NWA_DECLARED_DATE) = @Month group by Ac.vity_Code) src on dt.ac.vity = src.ac.vity
update @DataTable set contacts = totalC, appoints = totalA, interviews =totalI, nwas = totalN from (select sum(contacts) totalC, sum(appoints) totalA, sum(interviews) totalI, sum(nwas) totalN from @DataTable) src where ac.vity='Total'
select * from @DataTable
END
